issue.title: [Java] TastLeak was put at the wrong location
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7713](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7713). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems `TestLeak.java` was put at the wrong place, we should move it into `flight-core`.
